site_name: Tach - Simple heart rate monitor for working out.
site_description: Use Tach to record a workout from a Bluetooth heart rate monitor.
hero_title: Record and upload your heart rate.
hero_subtitle: Tach is a timer and heart rate recorder that pairs with any Bluetooth heart rate monitor. If you're stuck in an indoor spin class, but want to upload your workout to Strava, Tach is for you.
